name: Star Smasher (jzderk)
description:
STAR SMASHER

A ninja wants  YOU dead! Catch his stars before they catch up to you!

Controls:

move - W,A,S,D or up, down, left, right

attack - space bar

This project was made by myself and my friend Hondo. We are both completely new to game dev and are starting out by learning Godot! This game is extremely simple and hardly a complete game but it was great to get our feet wet in the game making process.
